title: Blackberry Playbook::Lara Croft And The Guardian of Light
description:
This torrent contains V1 of Lara Croft and the Guardian Of Light for blackberry playbook.....

Well this game rocks but the price asked by the devlopers doesnt..

So i thought of uploading it

Well i can upload any famous game or app for the PB if i get requests and enough positive responses

INSTRUCTIONS::::::::

1)Install DDPB software (included in this torrent)
2)connect your playbook
3)turn on development mode
4)go the the homescreen
5)notice a new icon on the icon bar.Tap on it and enter the Ip Address from here into the DDPB installer
6)enter the password
7)click on connect
8)make sure your wifi is on
9)add the file and click on install


Enjoy....
